title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Text and Tree widgets are children of the shell. Currently, the text widget does not lose focus when clicking anywhere in the tree widget. This issue is observed only on Windows. Possible workaround is to create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree to ensure proper focus behavior.
OB: The text widget does not lose focus when clicking anywhere in the tree widget.
EB: The text widget should lose focus when clicking anywhere in the tree widget.
SR: To fix this issue, the text editor should be created as a sibling of the tree widget and moved above the tree widget to ensure that it loses focus when clicking anywhere in the tree.
